module CharDet
  class GB2312Prober < MultiByteCharSetProber
    def initialize
      super
      @_mCodingSM = CodingStateMachine.new(GB2312SMModel)
      @_mDistributionAnalyzer = GB2312DistributionAnalysis.new()
      reset()
    end

    def get_charset_name
      return "GB2312"
    end
  end
end
